java.lang.Object

    • createActivity

      @PostMapping @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_ADMIN\') or hasAuthority(\'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createActivity(@RequestBody GeneralActivity request)
      Creates a new activity.

      Registers a new activity in the system.

      Parameters:
      request - The request body containing the information of the new activity.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity The response entity indicating the success or failure of the creation operation.

    • getActivities

      @GetMapping @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Optional<Set<Activity>>> getActivities()
      Retrieves all activities.

      Retrieves all activities registered in the system.

      Returns:
      ResponseEntityinvalid input: '<'Optionalinvalid input: '<'Set>> The response entity containing the set of activities, if any.

    • updateActivity

      @PutMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_ADMIN\') or hasAuthority(\'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateActivity(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody GeneralActivity request)
      Updates an activity by replacing it with another.

      Replaces an existing activity with a new one.

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the activity to be updated.
      request - The request body containing the new activity information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity The response entity indicating the success or failure of the update operation.

    • patchActivity

      @PatchMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_ADMIN\') or hasAuthority(\'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> patchActivity(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody GeneralActivity request)
      Partially updates an activity.

      Updates some of the attributes of an activity.

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the activity to be updated.
      request - The request body containing the updated activity information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity The response entity indicating the success or failure of the update operation.

    • deleteActivity

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_USER\') and #id == authentication.principal.id") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteActivity(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes an activity.

      A user can delete an activity only if they are the creator of it.

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the activity to be deleted.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity The response entity indicating the success or failure of the deletion operation.

      Handles NoHandlerFoundException.

      Parameters:
      ex - The NoHandlerFoundException instance.
      request - The web request.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity The response entity containing details of the error.
